includedAssets.title: The Devil Wears Prada
includedAssets.synopsis: If fashion is a religion, Runway is its bible - and the magazine's editor Miranda Priestly (Meryl Streep) is its fearsome god. For an aspiring journalist like Andy (Anne Hathaway), landing a job as Miranda's personal assistant can open countless doors... But while she can defend becoming a slave to fashion, is she ready to sell her soul? Based on Lauren Weisberger's bestselling tale of bitchiness and backstabbing, this glossy satire comes with stiletto-sharp humour and plenty of Sex And The City appeal.

includedAssets.title: Bride Wars
includedAssets.synopsis: Best friends Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway double book their weddings and have to battle it out for the dream venue. Hysterical chick flick fun.

includedAssets.title: Love And Other Drugs
includedAssets.synopsis: Pharmaceutical salesman Jake Gyllenhaal reconsiders his womanising ways when he falls for patient Anne Hathaway. Sizzling romance.

includedAssets.title: Anne Hathaway Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Oscar winner Anne Hathaway stars as a new employee struggling with a tough boss (Meryl Streep), a bride-to-be battling her best friend (Kate Hudson) for the perfect wedding venue and a young woman with Parkinson's who falls for a pharmaceutical salesman (Jake Gyllenhaal) in this triple bill of clever comedies.
